subject: Custom suites with filter
msgSnippet: Hi I m just exploring JUnit4 for our project. What we like to do is to distinguish between integration tests, unit tests and database tests. Therefor I m using
messageBody:
Hi

I'm just exploring JUnit4 for our project.

What we like to do is to distinguish between integration tests, unit
tests and database tests. Therefor I'm using JUnitExt
(http://junitext.sourceforge.net/) categories to annotate my tests.

Now my question is, how I create suites where I can apply a certain
filter. Looking for documentation I always ended up with the example
with @RunWith(Suite.class).

Thanks
Matthias
BTW: Since we are developing Eclipse-Plugins, we would like to stick
to JUnit4 so we can use the standard run-configurations.
